column6: Thor is back and better than ever! Reenergized and reinvigorated, the Mighty God of Thunder presides over a similarly restored Asgard. But moments of quiet are never meant to last. With Mjolnir in hand, Thor sets off to defend his city yet again!
column8: | penciller (cover):Marko Djurdjevic | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Laura Martin | inker:Mark Morales
